-spec number_of_ways(S :: unicode:unicode_binary(), T :: unicode:unicode_binary(), K :: integer()) -> integer().
number_of_ways(S, T, K) ->
    Mod = 1000000007,
    {SList, TList} = {binary_to_list(S), binary_to_list(T)},
    N = length(SList),
    GCD = gcd(N, K),
    Count = count_rotations(SList, TList, N, GCD, Mod),
    (Count * pow(K div GCD, N div GCD, Mod)) rem Mod.

count_rotations(_, _, _, 0, _) -> 0;
count_rotations(SList, TList, N, GCD, Mod) ->
    count_rotations_helper(SList, TList, N, 0, GCD, Mod, 0).

count_rotations_helper(_, _, _, GCD, GCD, _, Count) -> Count;
count_rotations_helper(SList, TList, N, Index, GCD, Mod, Count) ->
    Rotated = rotate(SList, Index),
    NewCount = if Rotated == TList -> (Count + 1) rem Mod; true -> Count end,
    count_rotations_helper(SList, TList, N, Index + 1, GCD, Mod, NewCount).

rotate(List, 0) -> List;
rotate(List, N) ->
    {Left, Right} = lists:split(length(List) - N, List),
    Right ++ Left.

gcd(A, 0) -> A;
gcd(A, B) -> gcd(B, A rem B).

pow(_, 0, _) -> 1;
pow(Base, Exp, Mod) when Exp rem 2 == 0 ->
    Half = pow(Base, Exp div 2, Mod),
    (Half * Half) rem Mod;
pow(Base, Exp, Mod) ->
    (Base * pow(Base, Exp - 1, Mod)) rem Mod.
